    def __init__(self, file_path):
        self.file_path = file_path

        self.text = self.remove_punctuations(self.get_text())
        self.text = self.remove_newline(self.text)
        self.model = self.model()

    def get_text(self):
        text = []
        for line in open(self.file_path):
            text.append(line)
        return ' '.join(text)

    def remove_punctuations(self, text):
        return text.translate(str.maketrans('','', string.punctuation))

    def remove_newline(self, text):
        return text.replace('\\n', '')

    def model(self):
        words = self.text.split(' ')

        markov_dict = defaultdict(list)

        for current_word, next_word in zip(words[0:-1], words[1:]):
            markov_dict[current_word].append(next_word)

        return dict(markov_dict)
`})}),(0,e.jsxs)(s.h3,{id:"t\u1EA1o-c\xE2u-ng\u1EABu-nhi\xEAn",children:[(0,e.jsx)(s.a,{href:"#t\u1EA1o-c\xE2u-ng\u1EABu-nhi\xEAn","aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",children:(0,e.jsx)(s.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"T\u1EA1o c\xE2u ng\u1EABu nhi\xEAn"]}),(0,e.jsx)(s.pre,{children:(0,e.jsx)(s.code,{className:"language-python",children:`def predict_words(chain, first_word, number_of_words=5):
    if first_word in list(chain.keys()):
        word1 = str(first_word)

        predictions = word1.capitalize()

        for i in range(number_of_words-1):
            word2 = random.choice(chain[word1])
            word1 = word2
            predictions += ' ' + word2

        predictions += '.'
        return predictions
    else:
        return "Word not in corpus"
`})}),(0,e.jsxs)(s.h3,{id:"ki\u1EC3m-th\u1EED",children:[(0,e.jsx)(s.a,{href:"#ki\u1EC3m-th\u1EED","aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",children:(0,e.jsx)(s.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Ki\u1EC3m th\u1EED"]}),(0,e.jsx)(s.pre,{children:(0,e.jsx)(s.code,{className:"language-python",children:`m = Markov('./shakespeare.txt')
chain = m.model
output = predict_words(chain, first_word = 'but')
